executable.title: Segment Connected Components Using Parzen PDFs (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given multiple, registered images and foreground and background masks, computes multivariate PDFs for inside and outside classes, and then performs competitive region growing.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: labelmap
image.label: Label Map
image.description: Label map that designates the object of interest and "other."

integer-vector.name: objectId
integer-vector.label: Object ID
integer-vector.description: List of values that represent the objects in the label map.

integer.name: voidId

integer.description: Value that represents "nothing" in the label map.

integer.name: erodeRadius

integer.description: Radius of noise to clip from edges.

integer.label: Hole Fill Iterations
integer.description: Number of iterations for hole filling.

boolean.name: dilateFirst

boolean.description: Performs dilation then erosion (versus opposite order) to help fill-in sparse models.
